titleStmt.title: A true relation of the late fight betweene Sr. VVilliam VVallers forces and those sent from Oxford with the manner of Sir William Wallers retreat to Bristoll, and the condition of his army at this present / sent from a Colonell in that army now in Bristoll to a friend of his in London.
titleStmt.author: Colonell in the Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dexter for R. Dunscum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
